data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Viraktamath, C. A., Meshram, Naresh M. (2017): A review of the coelidiine leafhopper genus Mahellus (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Coelidiinae) with description of two new species from the Oriental region. Zootaxa 4258 (3): 271-280, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4258.3.4|6 occurrences
